DOC.brief_summary: The scientific aim study investigate efficacy safety incobotulinumtoxinA ( Xeomin-Merz Pharmaceuticals ) tremor Parkinson‟s disease . Our hypothesis injection Xeomin muscle arm , forearm hand decrease tremor amplitude frequency lead improvement patient‟s function .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Efficacy Safety IncobotulinumtoxinA ( Xeomin ) Parkinson 's Tremor : A Customized Approach
DOC.detailed_description: This investigator initiate , randomize , double blind , placebo control , cross study support Merz pharmaceutical . Patients Parkinson‟s disease ( Yale Neurology Movement disorder clinic ) approach member research team ( PI sub-investigators ) see meet inclusion exclusion criterion wish participate study . If eligible consent participate study , series questionaires , examination treatment session .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria . 1 . Age 18 year 2 . Both sexes 3. races/ethnic group . 4 . Meeting clinical diagnosis Parkinson 's disease presence moderate severe Parkinson tremor refractory standard medical treatment limit patient‟s functionality and/or pose significant discomfort . 5 . Subjects able read , speak , understand English . Exclusion Criteria . 1 . Existing significant acute medical condition ( i.e . cardiovascular , endocrine , hematologic , neoplastic , infectious , autoimmune disorder ) significant swallow breathe difficulty . 2 . Pregnancy plan pregnancy ( determined urine pregnancy test ) . 3 . Active breast feeding . 4 . Enrollment clinical trial ( currently within past 3 month ) treatment impose protocol . 5 . Any subject botulinum toxin treatment would contraindicate ; know allergy sensitivity medication . 6 . Subjects young 18 year age . Neuromuscularjunction disorder . 7 . Evidence acute pathology neuroimaging . 8 . Axis I diagnosis determined neurologist psychiatrist . 9 . Use Anesthetic medication within two week corticosteroid injection within 4 week enrollment . 10 . Those received botulinum toxin injection past 4 month .
